requestParams.name: source
requestParams.desc: 请求来源（需调用方自定义标识：OPEN_XXXX）

requestParams.name: warehouse_id
requestParams.desc: 门店或独立仓id   注意：连锁版必填

children.name: idempotent_no
children.desc: 幂等单号（请求唯一标识）

children.name: type
children.desc:
业务类型（STOCK_CHECK(1, "库存盘点单"),
  STOCK_IN(2, "采购入库单"),
  STOCK_RETURN(3, "退货入库单"),
  STOCK_OUT(4, "出库单")）

children.name: source_order_no
children.desc: 退货入库单用于记录关联订单号

children.name: status
children.desc:
状态（DOING(1, "待处理"),
  DONE(2, "处理成功"),
  FAIL(3, "处理失败")）

children.name: amount
children.desc: 系统库存数量，amount= realAmount - oldAmount

children.name: real_amount
children.desc: 实际库存数量,变更后的值

token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['source']="test"
params['show_item']="true"
params['business_order_no']="SPD171204175539437782"

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.retail.stock.stockcheck.queryone', '3.0.0', 'POST', params=params, files=files)
